title: Task Management App
description: A productivity web application that helps users organize tasks, set deadlines, and track progress with an intuitive dashboard.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce website featuring product listings, shopping cart functionality, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A responsive weather application that provides real-time weather updates and 7-day forecasts using external APIs.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application supporting private messaging, group chats, and online status indicators.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and contact information with smooth animations.

title: Blogging Platform
description: A content management system where users can create, edit, and publish blog posts with authentication and comments.
